summary: Maric is a Specialist in one handed and magic. he can be found in the Beggars Row, Riften. he has loads of health so no need to give him Armour and cover up his amazing clothes and he has an amazing story to go along with him.
descriptionHtml:
Maric is a Specialist in one handed and magic. he can be found in the Beggars Row, Riften. he has loads of health so no need to give him Armour and cover up his amazing clothes and he has an amazing story to go along with him.

STORY:
Maric lived with his farther Sheogorath who is the Daedric Prince of Madness in the Pelagius Wing of the blue palace until he ran away from home because of his farther madness. Maric took a carriage ride all the way to Riften where he became a performer for the Jarl using magic, but he then became hooked on Skooma and became an addict. he fell on rough times and became homeless and now lives in Beggars Row and has become a Mercenary.
author: Gallergar
